column4: Guys, i got a problem with My Wifi Card, (Centrino Wireless-N 1030) and when i connect it is very very slow (no more than 50kB/s) while my internet goes over 500kB/s
i am using Ubuntu Precise AMD64
did you try this wifi with other device?
yes, in the same computer, on another OS
it "works" on Precise AMD64 too, but it is very slow...
in order to get it faster on the other OS i had to disable N-Mode
but seems it don't work here
maybe the wireless router don't works very well with n-mode
but since i have no admin account on the router i have no other choice than make it works that way
hmm.. maybe ...  did you try reinstal wifi driver ?
no, all that i can tell you to do , you already tried
